types.name: ID
types.description: The `ID` scalar type represents a unique identifier, often used to refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable. When expected as an input type, any string (such as `"4"`) or integer (such as `4`) input value will be accepted as an ID.

types.name: Int
types.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: String
types.description: The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

types.name: BlogPost
types.description: The blogPost type

fields.name: ancestors
fields.description: Ancestors of the object

args.name: types
args.description: The types of ancestors to check for. Defaults to the same type as the current object

fields.name: author
fields.description: The author field will return a queryable User type matching the post's author.

fields.name: blocks
fields.description: Structured / parsed post content described as a shallow tree of block elements

fields.name: blogPostId
fields.description: The id field matches the WP_Post->ID field.

fields.name: commentStatus
fields.description: Whether the comments are open or closed for this particular post.

fields.name: content
fields.description: The content of the post.

args.name: format
args.description: Format of the field output

fields.name: date
fields.description: Post publishing date.

fields.name: dateGmt
fields.description: The publishing date set in GMT.

fields.name: desiredSlug
fields.description: The desired slug of the post

fields.name: editLast
fields.description: The user that most recently edited the object

fields.name: editLock
fields.description: If a user has edited the object within the past 15 seconds, this will return the user and the time they last edited. Null if the edit lock doesn't exist or is greater than 15 seconds

fields.name: enclosure
fields.description: The RSS enclosure for the object

fields.name: excerpt
fields.description: The excerpt of the post.

args.name: format
args.description: Format of the field output

fields.name: featuredImage
fields.description: The featured image for the object

fields.name: guid
fields.description: The global unique identifier for this post. This currently matches the value stored in WP_Post->guid and the guid column in the "post_objects" database table.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The globally unique ID for the object

fields.name: link
fields.description: The permalink of the post

fields.name: menuOrder
fields.description: A field used for ordering posts. This is typically used with nav menu items or for special ordering of hierarchical content types.

fields.name: modified
fields.description: The local modified time for a post. If a post was recently updated the modified field will change to match the corresponding time.

fields.name: modifiedGmt
fields.description: The GMT modified time for a post. If a post was recently updated the modified field will change to match the corresponding time in GMT.

fields.name: parent
fields.description: The parent of the object. The parent object can be of various types

fields.name: pinged
fields.description: URLs that have been pinged.

fields.name: pingStatus
fields.description: Whether the pings are open or closed for this particular post.

fields.name: slug
fields.description: The uri slug for the post. This is equivalent to the WP_Post->post_name field and the post_name column in the database for the "post_objects" table.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The current status of the object

types.name: AvatarRatingEnum
types.description: What rating to display avatars up to. Accepts 'G', 'PG', 'R', 'X', and are judged in that order. Default is the value of the 'avatar_rating' option

types.name: Avatar
types.description: Avatars are profile images for users. WordPress by default uses the Gravatar service to host and fetch avatars from.

fields.name: default
fields.description: URL for the default image or a default type. Accepts '404' (return a 404 instead of a default image), 'retro' (8bit), 'monsterid' (monster), 'wavatar' (cartoon face), 'indenticon' (the 'quilt'), 'mystery', 'mm', or 'mysteryman' (The Oyster Man), 'blank' (transparent GIF), or 'gravatar_default' (the Gravatar logo).

fields.name: extraAttr
fields.description: HTML attributes to insert in the IMG element. Is not sanitized.

fields.name: forceDefault
fields.description: Whether to always show the default image, never the Gravatar.

fields.name: foundAvatar
fields.description: Whether the avatar was successfully found.

fields.name: height
fields.description: Height of the avatar image.

fields.name: rating
fields.description: What rating to display avatars up to. Accepts 'G', 'PG', 'R', 'X', and are judged in that order.

fields.name: scheme
fields.description: Type of url scheme to use. Typically HTTP vs. HTTPS.

fields.name: size
fields.description: The size of the avatar in pixels. A value of 96 will match a 96px x 96px gravatar image.

fields.name: url
fields.description: URL for the gravatar image source.

fields.name: width
fields.description: Width of the avatar image.

types.name: UserToBlogPostConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the UserToBlogPostConnection connection

inputFields.name: author
inputFields.description:
The user that's connected as the author of the object. Use the
							userId for the author object.

inputFields.name: authorIn
inputFields.description: Find objects connected to author(s) in the array of author's userIds

inputFields.name: authorName
inputFields.description: Find objects connected to the author by the author's nicename

inputFields.name: authorNotIn
inputFields.description:
Find objects NOT connected to author(s) in the array of author's
							userIds

inputFields.name: categoryId
inputFields.description: Category ID

inputFields.name: categoryIn
inputFields.description:
Array of category IDs, used to display objects from one
										category OR another

inputFields.name: categoryName
inputFields.description: Use Category Slug

inputFields.name: dateQuery
inputFields.description: Filter the connection based on dates

inputFields.name: hasPassword
inputFields.description:
True for objects with passwords; False for objects without passwords;
							null for all objects with or without passwords

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Specific ID of the object

inputFields.name: in
inputFields.description: Array of IDs for the objects to retrieve

inputFields.name: mimeType
inputFields.description: Get objects with a specific mimeType property

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Slug / post_name of the object

inputFields.name: nameIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects to retrieve. Use slugs

inputFields.name: notIn
inputFields.description:
Specify IDs NOT to retrieve. If this is used in the same query as "in",
							it will be ignored

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: What paramater to use to order the objects by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description:
Use ID to return only children. Use 0 to return only top-level
							items

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects whose parent is in an array

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Specify posts whose parent is not in an array

inputFields.name: password
inputFields.description: Show posts with a specific password.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Show Posts based on a keyword search

inputFields.name: tag
inputFields.description: Tag Slug

inputFields.name: tagId
inputFields.description: Use Tag ID

inputFields.name: tagIn
inputFields.description:
Array of tag IDs, used to display objects from one tag OR
							another

inputFields.name: tagSlugAnd
inputFields.description:
Array of tag slugs, used to display objects from one tag OR
							another

inputFields.name: tagSlugIn
inputFields.description:
Array of tag slugs, used to exclude objects in specified
							tags

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: Title of the object

inputFields.description: Month number (from 1 to 12)

fields.description: Whether delete this type of content when the author of it is deleted from the system.

fields.description: Description of the content type.

fields.name: excludeFromSearch
fields.description: Whether to exclude posts with this post type from front end search results.

fields.name: graphqlPluralName
fields.description: The plural name of the post type within the GraphQL Schema.

fields.name: graphqlSingleName
fields.description: The singular name of the post type within the GraphQL Schema.

fields.name: hasArchive
fields.description: Whether this content type should have archives. Content archives are generated by type and by date.

fields.name: hierarchical
fields.description: Whether the post type is hierarchical, for example pages.

fields.name: label
fields.description: Display name of the content type.

fields.name: labels
fields.description: Details about the post type labels.

fields.name: menuIcon
fields.description: The name of the icon file to display as a menu icon.

fields.name: menuPosition
fields.description: The position of this post type in the menu. Only applies if show_in_menu is true.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The internal name of the post type. This should not be used for display purposes.

fields.name: public
fields.description: Whether a post type is intended for use publicly either via the admin interface or by front-end users. While the default settings of exclude_from_search, publicly_queryable, show_ui, and show_in_nav_menus are inherited from public, each does not rely on this relationship and controls a very specific intention.

fields.name: publiclyQueryable
fields.description: Whether queries can be performed on the front end for the post type as part of parse_request().

fields.name: restBase
fields.description: Name of content type to diplay in REST API "wp/v2" namespace.

fields.name: restControllerClass
fields.description: The REST Controller class assigned to handling this content type.

fields.name: showInAdminBar
fields.description: Makes this post type available via the admin bar.

fields.name: showInGraphql
fields.description: Whether to add the post type to the GraphQL Schema.

fields.name: showInMenu
fields.description: Where to show the post type in the admin menu. To work, $show_ui must be true. If true, the post type is shown in its own top level menu. If false, no menu is shown. types.name: BulletinToCoAuthorConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the BulletinToCoAuthorConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default true

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: shouldOnlyIncludeConnectedItems
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, only the items connected to the source item will be returned. If false, all items will be returned regardless of connection to the source

inputFields.name: shouldOutputInFlatList
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, the connection will be output in a flat list instead of the hierarchical list. So child terms will be output in the same level as the parent terms

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ChapterToCoAuthorConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ChapterToCoAuthorConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default true

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: shouldOnlyIncludeConnectedItems
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, only the items connected to the source item will be returned. If false, all items will be returned regardless of connection to the source

inputFields.name: shouldOutputInFlatList
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, the connection will be output in a flat list instead of the hierarchical list. So child terms will be output in the same level as the parent terms

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: CategoryToCategoryConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the CategoryToCategoryConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default true

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: shouldOnlyIncludeConnectedItems
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, only the items connected to the source item will be returned. If false, all items will be returned regardless of connection to the source

inputFields.name: shouldOutputInFlatList
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, the connection will be output in a flat list instead of the hierarchical list. So child terms will be output in the same level as the parent terms

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: CollectionToTagConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the CollectionToTagConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default true

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: shouldOnlyIncludeConnectedItems
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, only the items connected to the source item will be returned. If false, all items will be returned regardless of connection to the source

inputFields.name: shouldOutputInFlatList
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, the connection will be output in a flat list instead of the hierarchical list. So child terms will be output in the same level as the parent terms

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: NugToEmailListConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the NugToEmailListConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default true

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: shouldOnlyIncludeConnectedItems
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, only the items connected to the source item will be returned. If false, all items will be returned regardless of connection to the source

inputFields.name: shouldOutputInFlatList
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, the connection will be output in a flat list instead of the hierarchical list. So child terms will be output in the same level as the parent terms

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: TopicToBulletinConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the TopicToBulletinConnection connection

inputFields.name: author
inputFields.description:
The user that's connected as the author of the object. Use the
							userId for the author object.

inputFields.name: authorIn
inputFields.description: Find objects connected to author(s) in the array of author's userIds

inputFields.name: authorName
inputFields.description: Find objects connected to the author by the author's nicename

inputFields.name: authorNotIn
inputFields.description:
Find objects NOT connected to author(s) in the array of author's
							userIds

inputFields.name: categoryId
inputFields.description: Category ID

inputFields.name: categoryIn
inputFields.description:
Array of category IDs, used to display objects from one
										category OR another

inputFields.name: categoryName
inputFields.description: Use Category Slug

inputFields.name: dateQuery
inputFields.description: Filter the connection based on dates

inputFields.name: hasPassword
inputFields.description:
True for objects with passwords; False for objects without passwords;
							null for all objects with or without passwords

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Specific ID of the object

inputFields.name: in
inputFields.description: Array of IDs for the objects to retrieve

inputFields.name: mimeType
inputFields.description: Get objects with a specific mimeType property

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Slug / post_name of the object

inputFields.name: nameIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects to retrieve. Use slugs

inputFields.name: notIn
inputFields.description:
Specify IDs NOT to retrieve. If this is used in the same query as "in",
							it will be ignored

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: What paramater to use to order the objects by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description:
Use ID to return only children. Use 0 to return only top-level
							items

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects whose parent is in an array

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Specify posts whose parent is not in an array

inputFields.name: password
inputFields.description: Show posts with a specific password.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Show Posts based on a keyword search

inputFields.name: tag
inputFields.description: Tag Slug

inputFields.name: tagId
inputFields.description: Use Tag ID

inputFields.name: tagIn
inputFields.description:
Array of tag IDs, used to display objects from one tag OR
							another

inputFields.name: tagSlugAnd
inputFields.description:
Array of tag slugs, used to display objects from one tag OR
							another

inputFields.name: tagSlugIn
inputFields.description:
Array of tag slugs, used to exclude objects in specified
							tags

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: Title of the object

types.name: EmailToEmailSegmentConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the EmailToEmailSegmentConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default true

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: shouldOnlyIncludeConnectedItems
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, only the items connected to the source item will be returned. If false, all items will be returned regardless of connection to the source

inputFields.name: shouldOutputInFlatList
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, the connection will be output in a flat list instead of the hierarchical list. So child terms will be output in the same level as the parent terms

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: PromotionToObsessionConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the PromotionToObsessionConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default true

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: shouldOnlyIncludeConnectedItems
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, only the items connected to the source item will be returned. If false, all items will be returned regardless of connection to the source

inputFields.name: shouldOutputInFlatList
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, the connection will be output in a flat list instead of the hierarchical list. So child terms will be output in the same level as the parent terms

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default true

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: shouldOnlyIncludeConnectedItems
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, only the items connected to the source item will be returned. If false, all items will be returned regardless of connection to the source

inputFields.name: shouldOutputInFlatList
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, the connection will be output in a flat list instead of the hierarchical list. So child terms will be output in the same level as the parent terms

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ShowToBulletinConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ShowToBulletinConnection connection

inputFields.name: author
inputFields.description:
The user that's connected as the author of the object. Use the
							userId for the author object.

inputFields.name: authorIn
inputFields.description: Find objects connected to author(s) in the array of author's userIds

inputFields.name: authorName
inputFields.description: Find objects connected to the author by the author's nicename

inputFields.name: authorNotIn
inputFields.description:
Find objects NOT connected to author(s) in the array of author's
							userIds

inputFields.name: categoryId
inputFields.description: Category ID

inputFields.name: categoryIn
inputFields.description:
Array of category IDs, used to display objects from one
										category OR another

inputFields.name: categoryName
inputFields.description: Use Category Slug

inputFields.name: dateQuery
inputFields.description: Filter the connection based on dates

inputFields.name: hasPassword
inputFields.description:
True for objects with passwords; False for objects without passwords;
							null for all objects with or without passwords

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Specific ID of the object

inputFields.name: in
inputFields.description: Array of IDs for the objects to retrieve

inputFields.name: mimeType
inputFields.description: Get objects with a specific mimeType property

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Slug / post_name of the object

inputFields.name: nameIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects to retrieve. Use slugs

inputFields.name: notIn
inputFields.description:
Specify IDs NOT to retrieve. If this is used in the same query as "in",
							it will be ignored

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: What paramater to use to order the objects by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description:
Use ID to return only children. Use 0 to return only top-level
							items

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects whose parent is in an array

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Specify posts whose parent is not in an array

inputFields.name: password
inputFields.description: Show posts with a specific password.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Show Posts based on a keyword search

inputFields.name: tag
inputFields.description: Tag Slug

inputFields.name: tagId
inputFields.description: Use Tag ID

inputFields.name: tagIn
inputFields.description:
Array of tag IDs, used to display objects from one tag OR
							another

inputFields.name: tagSlugAnd
inputFields.description:
Array of tag slugs, used to display objects from one tag OR
							another

inputFields.name: tagSlugIn
inputFields.description:
Array of tag slugs, used to exclude objects in specified
							tags

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: Title of the object

types.name: ChapterToProjectConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ChapterToProjectConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default true

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: shouldOnlyIncludeConnectedItems
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, only the items connected to the source item will be returned. If false, all items will be returned regardless of connection to the source

inputFields.name: shouldOutputInFlatList
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, the connection will be output in a flat list instead of the hierarchical list. So child terms will be output in the same level as the parent terms

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

inputFields.description:
Specify IDs NOT to retrieve. If this is used in the same query as "in",

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: What paramater to use to order the objects by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description:
Use ID to return only children. Use 0 to return only top-level
							items

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects whose parent is in an array

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Specify posts whose parent is not in an array

inputFields.name: password
inputFields.description: Show posts with a specific password.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Show Posts based on a keyword search

inputFields.description: Tag Slug

inputFields.name: tagId
inputFields.description: Use Tag ID

inputFields.name: tagIn
inputFields.description:
Array of tag IDs, used to display objects from one tag OR
							another

inputFields.name: tagSlugAnd
inputFields.description:
Array of tag slugs, used to display objects from one tag OR
							another

inputFields.name: tagSlugIn
inputFields.description:
Array of tag slugs, used to exclude objects in specified
							tags

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: Title of the object

types.name: BulletinToEditionConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the BulletinToEditionConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default true

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: shouldOnlyIncludeConnectedItems
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, only the items connected to the source item will be returned. If false, all items will be returned regardless of connection to the source

inputFields.name: shouldOutputInFlatList
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, the connection will be output in a flat list instead of the hierarchical list. So child terms will be output in the same level as the parent terms

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

args.name: types
args.description: The types of ancestors to check for. Defaults to the same type as the current object

fields.name: author
fields.description: The author field will return a queryable User type matching the post's author.

fields.name: commentStatus
fields.description: Whether the comments are open or closed for this particular post.

fields.name: content
fields.description: The content of the post.

args.name: format
args.description: Format of the field output

fields.name: date
fields.description: Post publishing date.

fields.name: dateGmt
fields.description: The publishing date set in GMT.

fields.name: desiredSlug
fields.description: The desired slug of the post

fields.name: editLast
fields.description: The user that most recently edited the object

fields.name: editLock
fields.description: If a user has edited the object within the past 15 seconds, this will return the user and the time they last edited. Null if the edit lock doesn't exist or is greater than 15 seconds

fields.name: enclosure
fields.description: The RSS enclosure for the object

fields.name: excerpt
fields.description: The excerpt of the post.

args.name: format
args.description: Format of the field output

fields.name: guid
fields.description: The global unique identifier for this post. This currently matches the value stored in WP_Post->guid and the guid column in the "post_objects" database table.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The globally unique ID for the object

fields.name: link
fields.description: The permalink of the post

fields.name: menuOrder
fields.description: A field used for ordering posts. This is typically used with nav menu items or for special ordering of hierarchical content types.

fields.name: modified
fields.description: The local modified time for a post. If a post was recently updated the modified field will change to match the corresponding time.

fields.name: modifiedGmt
fields.description: The GMT modified time for a post. If a post was recently updated the modified field will change to match the corresponding time in GMT.

fields.name: parent
fields.description: The parent of the object. The parent object can be of various types

fields.name: pinged
fields.description: URLs that have been pinged.

fields.name: pingStatus
fields.description: Whether the pings are open or closed for this particular post.

fields.name: revisionId
fields.description: The id field matches the WP_Post->ID field.

fields.name: slug
fields.description: The uri slug for the post. This is equivalent to the WP_Post->post_name field and the post_name column in the database for the "post_objects" table.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The current status of the object

fields.name: termNames
fields.description: Terms connected to the revision

args.name: taxonomies
args.description: Select which taxonomies to limit the results to

fields.name: terms
fields.description: Terms connected to the revision

args.name: taxonomies
args.description: Select which taxonomies to limit the results to

fields.name: termSlugs
fields.description: Terms connected to the revision

args.name: taxonomies
args.description: Select which taxonomies to limit the results to

fields.name: title
fields.description: The title of the post. This is currently just the raw title. An amendment to support rendered title needs to be made.

args.name: format
args.description: Format of the field output

fields.name: toPing
fields.description: URLs queued to be pinged.

fields.name: uri
fields.description: URI path for the resource

types.name: PostToCategoryConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the PostToCategoryConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default true

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: shouldOnlyIncludeConnectedItems
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, only the items connected to the source item will be returned. If false, all items will be returned regardless of connection to the source

inputFields.name: shouldOutputInFlatList
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, the connection will be output in a flat list instead of the hierarchical list. So child terms will be output in the same level as the parent terms

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

Array of IDs of users whose unapproved comments will be returned by the
							query regardless of status.

inputFields.description: Include comments from a given array of comment types.

inputFields.name: commentTypeNotIn
inputFields.description: Exclude comments from a given array of comment types.

inputFields.description: Array of author IDs to retrieve comments for.

Limit results to those affiliated with a given content object
							ID.

Array of content object IDs to include affiliated comments

							for.

Array of content object statuses to retrieve affiliated comments for.
							Pass 'any' to match any value.

							for.

inputFields.description: Search term(s) to retrieve matching comments for.

inputFields.description: Include comments for a specific user ID.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default true

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: shouldOnlyIncludeConnectedItems
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, only the items connected to the source item will be returned. If false, all items will be returned regardless of connection to the source

inputFields.name: shouldOutputInFlatList
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, the connection will be output in a flat list instead of the hierarchical list. So child terms will be output in the same level as the parent terms

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: shouldOnlyIncludeConnectedItems
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, only the items connected to the source item will be returned. If false, all items will be returned regardless of connection to the source

inputFields.name: shouldOutputInFlatList
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, the connection will be output in a flat list instead of the hierarchical list. So child terms will be output in the same level as the parent terms

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: RootQueryToEditionConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the RootQueryToEditionConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default true

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: shouldOnlyIncludeConnectedItems
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, only the items connected to the source item will be returned. If false, all items will be returned regardless of connection to the source

inputFields.name: shouldOutputInFlatList
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, the connection will be output in a flat list instead of the hierarchical list. So child terms will be output in the same level as the parent terms

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: RootQueryToObsessionConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the RootQueryToObsessionConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default true

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: shouldOnlyIncludeConnectedItems
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, only the items connected to the source item will be returned. If false, all items will be returned regardless of connection to the source

inputFields.name: shouldOutputInFlatList
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, the connection will be output in a flat list instead of the hierarchical list. So child terms will be output in the same level as the parent terms

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default true

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: shouldOnlyIncludeConnectedItems
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, only the items connected to the source item will be returned. If false, all items will be returned regardless of connection to the source

inputFields.name: shouldOutputInFlatList
inputFields.description: Default false. If true, the connection will be output in a flat list instead of the hierarchical list. So child terms will be output in the same level as the parent terms

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

inputFields.description: An array of nicenames to exclude. Users matching one of these nicenames will not be included in results.

inputFields.name: roleNotIn
inputFields.description: An array of role names to exclude. Users matching one or more of these roles will not be included in results.
